docs.title: How To Use
docs.text:
Use poetry_project as shown below:

# Code here...
import os
print(os.getcwd())

docs.title: MkDocs Config
docs.text:
# Copyright © 2023 Anthony Mugendi
site_name: poetry_project
copyright: Copyright © 2023 Anthony Mugendi.
# site_url: https://mugendi.github.io/wraptimer/
# repo_url: https://github.com/mugendi/wraptimer
edit_uri: blob/main/docs/
docs_dir: docs
# navigation bar
nav: - index.md
# Watch
watch:
- mkdocs.yml
- poetry_project
- docs
- README.md
# Theme
# https://squidfunk.github.io/mkdocs-material/reference/
theme:
name: ansible
highlightjs: true
# https://squidfunk.github.io/mkdocs-material/setup/changing-the-colors/
palette:
# can be either "default, red, pink, purple, deep purple, indigo, blue, light blue, cyan, teal, green, light green, lime, yellow, amber, orange, deep orange, brown, grey, blue grey, black, white"
- primary: indigo
features:
- content.code.copy
- content.action.edit
- navigation.expand
- navigation.sections
- navigation.instant
- navigation.indexes
- navigation.tracking
- toc.integrate
- content.tooltips
icon:
admonition:
note: octicons/tag-16
abstract: octicons/checklist-16
info: octicons/info-16
tip: octicons/squirrel-16
success: octicons/check-16
question: octicons/question-16
warning: octicons/alert-16
failure: octicons/x-circle-16
danger: octicons/zap-16
bug: octicons/bug-16
example: octicons/beaker-16
quote: octicons/quote-16
# Plugins
plugins:
- autorefs
- material/search
- material/social
- material/tags
- mkdocstrings:
handlers:
python:
import:
- https://docs.python.org/3/objects.inv
options:
# heading_level: 2
docstring_style: sphinx
docstring_options:
ignore_init_summary: yes
show_submodules: yes
docstring_section_style: list
members_order: alphabetical
show_category_heading: no
# cannot merge init into class due to parse error...
# merge_init_into_class: yes
show_root_heading: yes
show_signature_annotations: yes
separate_signature: yes
show_bases: false
# markdown extensions
# https://facelessuser.github.io/pymdown-extensions/#extensions
markdown_extensions:
- markdown_include.include:
base_path: docs
- def_list
- footnotes
- pymdownx.emoji
- pymdownx.highlight:
anchor_linenums: true
linenums : true
auto_title: false
anchor_linenums: true
- pymdownx.inlinehilite
- pymdownx.magiclink:
repo_url_shortener: true
repo_url_shorthand: true
social_url_shorthand: true
social_url_shortener: true
user: facelessuser
repo: pymdown-extensions
normalize_issue_symbols: true
- pymdownx.tabbed:
alternate_style: true
- toc:
toc_depth: 4
permalink: true
- pymdownx.superfences
# https://facelessuser.github.io/pymdown-extensions/extensions/tasklist/
- pymdownx.tasklist:
custom_checkbox: true
# Used to highlight added, deleted or updated sections in a document
# https://facelessuser.github.io/pymdown-extensions/extensions/critic/
- pymdownx.critic
# https://facelessuser.github.io/pymdown-extensions/extensions/betterem/
- pymdownx.betterem
# https://facelessuser.github.io/pymdown-extensions/extensions/keys/
# ++ctrl+alt+delete++
- pymdownx.keys
# abbreviations and snippets
# https://squidfunk.github.io/mkdocs-material/reference/tooltips/#mkdocsyml
- abbr
- attr_list
- pymdownx.snippets:
auto_append:
- docs/includes/abbreviations.md
# Admonitions
# https://squidfunk.github.io/mkdocs-material/reference/admonitions/?h=admonition#octicons
- admonition
extra_css:
- styles/extra.css
